description:
It`s three straight days of testing for Class Black. While Haru is intent on passing those tests, another one of the girls is intent on killing her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Qu’est-ce qui arrive soudainement et ne rentre jamais ?
Totsuzen Yattekite, Kaeru Koto no Nai Mono wa?
What Comes Suddenly and Never Leaves?
突然やってきて, 帰ることのないものは?
